mapper.select:
SELECT rp.id, rp.title, rp.code, rp.editor_type editorType, rp.optional, rp.default_value defaultValue, CONVERT(rp.create_time, char) createTime, CONVERT(rp.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM report_property rp WHERE 1 = 1
AND rp.title like '%${title}%'
AND rp.code like '%${attrCode}%'
ORDER BY rp.last_update_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into report_property (id, title, code, editor_type, optional, default_value, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{attrCode}, #{editorType}, #{optional}, #{defaultValue}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT rp.id, rp.title, rp.code, rp.editor_type editorType, rp.optional, rp.default_value defaultValue, CONVERT(rp.create_time, char) createTime, CONVERT(rp.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM report_property rp WHERE rp.id = #{id} ORDER BY rp.last_update_time DESC;
